title: Disciple by Julie Dillon
author: Julie Dillon
excerpt: Clarkesworld Science Fiction and Fantasy Magazine and Podcast. This page: Disciple by Julie Dillon

Skip to content
Issue 100 – January 2015Cover ArtDiscipleJulie Dillon is a science fiction and fantasy illustrator creating art for books and magazines, as well as for her own projects and publications. She has won multiple Chesley awards, two Hugo Awards, and has been nominated for the World Fantasy Award.

 
 ISSN 1937-7843 · Clarkesworld Magazine © 2006-2022 Wyrm Publishing. Robot illustration by Serj Iulian.
